Amplify Your Business

CRM & Analytics

The most powerful and advanced business technology today is purchased out-of-the-box ready to fit any industry, company size, and departments. Realizing the benefits of this technology requires that it is properly managed and tailored to fit your specific company – that’s why we’re here!

Explore Our Solutions

Your business is our business

We take the time to fully understand our clients and tailor our solution to fit their unique requirements, budgets and timelines – we make leveraging technology simple and attainable for every business.

Why Amplify?

We start wherever you are!​

Whether you’re implementing a solution for the first time, transitioning away from your current platform or just interested in learning more about the benefits tailored tools can provide, we can help.

Your Situation

What people are saying

As a long-time client, what we value most in our relationship with Amplify is the effort they put in to understand our business prior to recommending a solution. Their work has enabled us to make quality data-driven decisions and has increased the efficiency of several departments with our business. I would highly recommend them to any business looking to improve their CRM software, digital workflows, and business analytics.  

 Mike Bayes – SVP, Client Experience @ CCI Wireless

Speaking for our team, we sincerely appreciate all the help and effort Amplify put towards our infrastructure enabling our business to grow.  We attribute much of our current and future successes to your deliverables and guidance building our CRM and Analytics.

Stephen Maycher – Director Operations / Owner @ Lantern Capital

Working with the entire Amplify team has helped to take our business to the next level. The biggest difference is that they understand what we are looking for in business and give us a leg up on building a system that leads our industry. They help us to “be more” every day!

Grant White – President @ Endeavour Wealth Management

Our project with Amplify involved implementation of Dynamics CRM where we really were designing our sales process from scratch.  Throughout this process I have appreciated having the ability to talk to people that take the time (and have the ability) to understand our business and truly customize our CRM platform to exactly what makes sense for us.  Amplify’s knowledge and experience in Dynamics, sales, and business in general, has been hugely valuable throughout this process, mostly because of their ability to apply this expertise to our unique requirements.  We have been very demanding and particular throughout our project, and Amplify has been great about listening and adapting as our sales process continues to evolve.   The result is a unique and highly customized CRM platform that will be a competitive advantage and a foundation of our business forever.   Amplify’s work can be trusted, they are well organized and thorough, and they are highly responsive when problems do arise.   I have no concerns recommending Amplify Solutions.

Ryan Mitchell – President / Owner @ Wildwood Transport
